scripts.setup: npm install -g typescript bower typings browserify watchify http-server gulp-cli
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components typings node_modules; npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc    -p ./ ; browserify lib/index.js --standalone Signal -o dist/index.js    ; gulp build
scripts.start: npm run build; tsc -w -p ./ & watchify   lib/index.js --standalone Signal -o dist/index.js -v & gulp watch & http-server -s -p 8000
